participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and creative, enjoys sharing her baking skills with others.
participant_1.background: i love to bake cookies. i have a dogs. the county wide bake sale is where i feel most at home. i'm scared of dying. knitting is my passion.

participant_2.name: Sophie

participant_2.background: i've blue eyes and red hair that comes to my waist. i love to play pobox. i hate school. i'm a 12 year old girl.
